name: Claw Man online
description:
Claw Man is an arcade claw machine (Claw Crane) simulation website for playing and skill training.

This website provides three main functions about Claw Machine: 1. Simulation and skill training 2.  Operation skills evaluation 3. World Claw Competition and ranking

It uses true physics engine to simulate the real world claw machines, so the player can swing and cast the inclined claw just like in the real world.

It can simulate the different swing frequency of the claw, adjust the reeling out speed, display the timing of hit button, and record all the tracks of claw. The player can use it to practice the claw skills to beat the real world claw machine and win the prizes in the arcades.

The claw skill level can be evaluate by attend Operation Level Test. Be aware the test is so mean, without enough claw skill proficiency will not pass the level.

Sharpen the claw operation skill is necessary, since it offers a completely fair world claw contest game to compete with claw players from all over the world. The player can know how good they are and the world ranking by attending the contest.
